name: oTree
tagline: A software platform for economics experiments
body:
![oTree on 3 devices](http://i.imgur.com/On2aBmi.png)

* [Introduction to oTree (PowerPoint)](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=F9813DEE7F07C54C%2112217)
* [Live demo](http://demo.otree.org/)
* [Download & source code](https://github.com/oTree-org/oTree)
* [Technical documentation](https://github.com/oTree-org/otree/wiki)

oTree was created by the [Chen Group](http://www.dlchen.ethz.ch/) at the Center for Law and Economics at ETH.
